name: account-agent
description: This agent is responsible for account management related queries

capabilities.name: create_account
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for account creation.

capabilities.name: edit_account
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for account update.

capabilities.name: delete_account
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for account deletion, account cancellation, or account termination.

capabilities.name: recover_password
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for password recovery.

capabilities.name: registration_problems
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for registration problems.

capabilities.name: switch_account
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for account switching.

name: cancel-agent
description: This agent is responsible for cancellation of services and related queries

capabilities.name: check_cancellation_fee
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for checking cancellation fee, withdrawal fee, or termination fee.

name: delivery-agent
description: This agent is responsible for delivery of products and related queries

capabilities.name: delivery_options
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for delivery options such as estimated delivery time/period, delivery methods and whether a particular location is deliverable or not.

capabilities.name: delivery_period
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for notifying when the delivery will be made.

name: feedback-agent
description: This agent is responsible for feedback management and related queries

capabilities.name: complaint
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for complaints and filing consumer claims.

capabilities.name: review
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for reviews.

name: invoice-agent
description: This agent is responsible for invoice management and related queries

capabilities.name: check_invoice
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for checking invoice.

capabilities.name: get_invoice
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for getting invoice.

name: order-agent
description: This agent is responsible for order management

capabilities.name: cancel_order
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for order cancellation.

capabilities.name: change_order
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for order change or purchased item change related queries.

capabilities.name: place_order
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for order placement, shopping and acquisition related queries.

capabilities.name: track_order
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for order tracking related queries such as ETA (Estimated Time of Arrival) etc

name: payment-agent
description: This agent is responsible for payment management

capabilities.name: check_payment_methods
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for checking payment methods.

capabilities.name: payment_issue
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for payment issue.

name: refund-agent
description: This agent is responsible for refund management and related queries

capabilities.name: check_refund_policy
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for checking refund policy.

capabilities.name: get_refund
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for getting refund.

capabilities.name: track_refund
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for refund tracking and refund status.

name: shipping-agent
description: This agent is responsible for shipping management and related queries

capabilities.name: check_shipping_address
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for checking shipping address.

capabilities.name: set_up_shipping_address
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for setting up shipping address.

name: subscription-agent
description: This agent is responsible for subscription management and related queries

capabilities.name: newsletter_subscription
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for newsletter subscription.

name: contact-agent
description: This agent is responsible for human support and customer service

capabilities.name: contact_human_agent
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for contacting human agent.

capabilities.name: contact_customer_service
capabilities.description: This capability is responsible for customer service.
